broadcasts: %notify%bold%Earn coins by playing the games, and spend coins at the shops at each game!

noperm.normal: %error%You don't have permission to use this command.

absplayer.unknwon: %error%That player is not online on this server.
absplayer.named: %error%The player "%player%" is not online on this server.

auth.whereami:
%info%You are in %em%LegionPE %em2%%class% %em3%(%ip%:%port%)
%verbose%Give this address to friends to play on this server together!

firstjoin.hub:
%em%Walk into a portal%info% or %em2%Choose an item in your inventory%info% to join a game.
%info%You can also type %em3%/help%info% in chat to check for available commands.

ip.hist: matching an IP in the IP history

register.prompt:
%info%Thanks for joining %bold%Legion PE%reset%!
%info%To protect your account, we are going to create an account for you.
%notify%Please enter the password you wish to register with, %em%directly into chat.
%verbose%Passwords are encrypted safely on our secure database.
%verbose%Nobody else, including staff, will be able to decode and read/use it.
%warning%You are disallwoed from mentioning your password in chat, so remember not to use a common word as your password.
register.retype: %notify%Thanks! Now please type the password again to confirm it.
register.success: %notify%Congratulations! You have successfully created your %em%own%notify% account on Legion PE!
register.mismatch:
%error%The two passwords aren't the same!
%notify%Please type a password you like %em%directly%notify% in chat.
%verbose%Type a totally different password if you want.

pass.prompt: %notify%Please enter the password you registered directly into chat.
pass.mismatch:
%info%If you didn't register this account, please choose a new name.
%verbose%If you believe that the owner of this 
%verbose%account is imposing you on purpose,
%verbose%and would like to take it back, 
%verbose%please email %em2%support@legionpvp.eu%info%.
%warning%The password you typed in isn't the one you registered with.
%warning%You have %chances%left before you are kicked.

notification.main:
%notify2%%bold%~~~~~~~~~~ ATTENTION ~~~~~~~~~~
%em%%issuer%%warning% sent you a warning!
%verbose%Message:
%em2%%message%
%notify%This warning carries %em3%%points%%notify% warning points.
%info%You now have %em%%totalpoints%%info% warning points in total.
notification.muted:
%error%You will be muted for %length%
%info%Send an email to %em2%support@legionpvp.eu%info% if you believe that this is a mistake.
notification.banned:
%error%You will be banned for %length%
%info%Send an email to %em2%support@legionpvp.eu%info% if you believe that this is a mistake.

kick.toolongonline: You have been online for more than 90 minutes. Take a rest! I bet your device must be pretty hot.
